resources.string:
Stremini Screen Scanner helps protect you from scams and fraud by analyzing screen content.
WHAT THIS SERVICE DOES: • Scans visible text on your screen when you manually activate it • Detects phishing attempts, scams, and suspicious content • Shows warning tags near dangerous content • Works across all apps to keep you safe
WHEN IT WORKS: • Only when YOU tap the scanner button in Stremini • Never reads your screen automatically • You have full control over when scanning happens
YOUR PRIVACY: • No data is stored or shared • Content is only analyzed when scanner is active • No personal information is collected • All processing is for security purposes only
HOW TO USE: 1. Enable this service 2. Open Stremini AI app 3. Activate the floating bubble 4. Tap the scanner icon when you want to check screen content
This service is designed to protect you, not track you. You can disable it anytime in your phone\'s Accessibility Settings.
